title: Emmerdale spoilers: Baby twist for Paddy and Chas as they welcome girl
text:
Chas Dingle (Lucy Pargeter) and Paddy Kirk (Dominic Brunt) have expanded their family in touching Emmerdale scenes – but they have been left surprised to welcome a baby girl when they had expected a baby boy.

Paddy arrived just in time as Chas gave birth in the toilets of the Woolpack and the couple were overwhelmed with happiness when they heard their new daughter’s first cries. As they cradled their newborn, everyone was in awe.

Aaron (Danny Miller) was overjoyed for his mum, who told him she wanted to be there for him at Robert Sugden’s (Ryan Hawley) hearing – but he told her she needed to focus on the baby. And Bear Wolf (Joshua Richards) was uncharacteristically moved as he held his grandchild.

Despite all of the carnage going on elsewhere in Yorkshire, with Cain (Jeff Hordley) and Moira (Natalie J Robb) almost being killed in a boat explosion on the lake, spirits were high in the Woolie as everyone celebrated the birth of a new Dingle.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Well everyone except Mandy (Lisa Riley), who was so knackered from her dancing, singing and crowbarring that she fell asleep in the aftermath.

As Paddy and Chas found a moment alone, they marvelled at their new arrival and knew that Grace would be in love with her sister. After such a tough and horrendous year for the couple, it’s warmed hearts to see them smile and bask in some joy for a change.

And in coming scenes, they will be discussing names for their daughter – with Bear providing some surprise inspiration for the couple.

The scenes of joy however, will be juxtaposed by scenes of loss for Aaron as he sees Aaron in court and watches the man he loves be sentenced for the death of Lee Posner.

As he faces up to life without Robert, can Chas be there for him?

Advertisement Advertisement
description: They had been expecting a boy.
